Title: View MidTerm/Final Grades
Step1: At hokie spa click the 'Grades Menu' button
Step2: Click on the 'Final Grades' or 'Midterm Grades' button
Step3: Select the term you want from the drop down menu and click submit
Step4: You grade report will be generated

Title: Calculate your GPA
Step1: At hokie spa click the 'Grades Menu' button
Step2: Click on the 'Calculate your GPA for a term' button
Step3: In the top left select the term of classes you want and click submit
Step4: The classes for the selected term will be generated in the table. Enter in the grades you want to calculate your GPA for
Step5: Click the 'Calculate GPA' button and view your generated GPA

Title: View your unofficial trancript
Step1: At hokie spa click the 'Transcripts and Certifications Menu' button
Step2: Click on the 'View Unofficial Transcripts' button
Step3: Select 'Undergraduate' and 'Web Transcript' from the two drop downs and click the 'Submit' button

Title: View your General Student Information i.e View your Advisor, Major, College, Academic Standing, Foreign Language requirement, etc.
Step1: At hokie spa click the 'View your General Student Information' button

Title: View your student conduct notifications
Step1: At hokie spa click the 'Student Conduct Notifications' button
Step2: If you have any student conduct notifications, they will appear here.

Title: View your student honor code notifications
Step1: At hokie spa click the 'Honor Code Violation Notifications' button
Step2: If you have any honor code violations they will appear here

Title: View and pay your tuition bill
Step1: At hokie spa click the 'Hokie Wallet' button
Step2: Click the 'View and Pay eBill' button
Step3: Click the 'View eBill Statement and Details' button
Step4: View your eBill information and click the 'Make a Payment' button
Step5: Select your payment method from the drop down and click 'Continue' to contiue with the payment wizard

Title: Enroll and View your 1098-T Tax Form
Step1: At hokie spa click the 'Hokie Wallet' button
Step2: Click the 'Enroll in 1098-T Tax Form' button
Step3: Chose one option and click 'I accept'
Step4: Retun to 'Hokie Wallet' and click the 'Tax Notification' button
Step5: Enter in the tax year you want and click 'Submit' to view

Title: Update your Address(es) and Phone(s)
Step1: At hokie spa click the 'Personal Information' button
Step2: Click on the 'Update Address(es) and Phone(s)' button
Step3: Select the type of address you want to change in the drop down and click the 'Submit' button
Step4: Enter in your new address or phone information and click submit

Title: Change your VT password (If you know your current password, if you donot click forgot password when logging into hokie spa)
Step1: At hokie spa click the 'Personal Information' button
Step5: Enter your old password and proceed with the wizard
